title: 22 killed in deadliest strike in central Beirut since start of war
content: Israeli strikes hit central Beirut on Thursday night in an attack local health officials said killed 22 people and injured 117.
summary: Israeli strikes hit central Beirut on Thursday night in an attack local health officials said killed 22 people and injured 117.

title: Live updates: Israel’s cabinet to vote on Iran response; U.N. says 2 peacekeepers injured in Lebanon
content: Israel’s security cabinet will meet Thursday to vote on Israel’s response to Iran’s Oct. 1 missile attack. The U.N. said two peacekeepers were injured by Israeli fire.
summary: Israel’s security cabinet will meet Thursday to vote on Israel’s response to Iran’s Oct. 1 missile attack. The U.N. said two peacekeepers were injured by Israeli fire.

title: Zelensky takes his ‘Victory Plan’ to Europe after Biden cancels trip

title: Boris Johnson just published his political memoir. It’s unbelievable.

content: The Living Planet Index tracks thousands of vertebrate species globally and found the worst declines were in Latin America and the Caribbean.
